name: Lazor Target: Gun Drone
description:
You are one of a select few pilots chosen for the Laser Targets program, taking command of highly sophisticated unmanned aircraft called Gun  Drones. Tasked with saving your nation from an unknown enemy invasion, do you have what it takes to see the mission through?

My first game jam. I planned on three levels but one polished level is what was possible in the time. Best played in full screen with sound.

Accessibility controls:

Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys

Fire - Z or N or Numpad7

Flares - X or M or Numpad 9

Lazor Target - Space or Numpad 0
